transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP
transcript.content:
IPRIMI MIVNIIST IR 10/ 92
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP
I have today completed my national round of talks with
business and unions in Brisbane and will deliver the
Economic Statement in the Parliament at 7.30pm on Wednesday
26 February 1992.
I will attend a meeting of the Small Business Coalition on
Thursday 6 February and senior Ministers will continue
discussions with other peak organisations and regional
representatives before the Statement is finalised.
Media arrangements for the Statement will be similar to
previous Budgets/ Economic Statements.
Media will be notified of details of lock-up arrangements
next week.
3 February 1992
